summary: This is an email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to other defense attorneys (Christian Everdell, Laura Menninger, Jeff Pagliuca) regarding the U.S. v. Maxwell case (S2 20 Cr. 330). It serves as a courtesy copy of an ECF filing and includes a confidentiality notice. The email chain references previous filings from November 3, 2021, including a bail application and a disclosure about juror names.

keyFacts: The document is an email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to co-counsel regarding the U.S. v. Maxwell case (S2 20 Cr. 330).
It references multiple legal filings from November 2021, including a bail application and a motion concerning juror name disclosures.
The email shows coordination among the defense legal team (Sternheim, Everdell, Menninger, Pagliuca) during the pre-trial phase.
Sternheim provides updated office address and preferred email contact information, indicating a change in her professional details.
